name: SNOMEDCTPortalHypertension
title: SNOMED CT Portal Hypertension and Related Conditions
description: A ValueSet for liver cirrhosis with portal hypertension (肝硬化合併門脈高壓). Requires liver cirrhosis AND additional text-based criteria.
copyright: This ValueSet includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

parameter.name: additional-criteria
parameter.valueString: Requires liver cirrhosis (19943007 or descendants) AND at least one of: Ascites, Portal hypertension, Esophageal varices, or Hepatic encephalopathy (text-based matching)
